6002
Elena Montiel
Yufei
Oscar Muñoz
Elena will present the work done on the methodology for reusing ontology design patterns using lexico-sintactyc patterns (20 minutes), including examples.
Yufei will present a demo of his application. He will use the examples presented by Elena.
Oscar will present some ideas about development of large scale Semantic Web Applications.

Oscar will present some ideas about development of large scale Semantic Web Applications.

13 March
6002
Oscar Corcho + all PhD students
Oscar will discuss with all PhD students some of the techniques to be used in order to make a paper successful. We will analyse the results of ESWC2008 papers (whether they are good or bad), see what a reviewer would do with those papers and discuss how they coudl be rewritten to improve them for their camera ready versions or for future conferences.

13 November
Sala de Grados
Auxi
Charla sobre BADELE.3000, una base de datos que contiene el vocabulario básico del español (5.800 palabras) que funciona como un generador automático de relaciones léxicas por campos léxicos. Contiene una ontología elaborada con criterios léxicos, y tiene aplicaciones a traducción automática y generación del lenguaje.
